PageTitle: bind interface(PW-VE load balancing group view)
FuncDef:
The bind interface command binds an interface to a location group.
The undo bind interface command cancels the configuration.
By default, no interface is bound to a location group.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an interface type.
Only the GE main interface is supported.

Specifies an interface number.
The value is a string of 1 to 64 characters.

Specifies an interface name.
The value is a string of 1 to 64 characters.

ExtraInfo: To bind an interface to a location group, run the bind interface command in the location group view. The outbound interface of the route configured for the local vBRAS-UP must be the interface bound to the location group. After a PW-VE interface is bound to a location group, services on the PW-VE interface are processed on the board where the interface bound to the location group resides.
